Commands.Shout: Self: 5 turns Shout (moderately raises ATK; slightly raises MAX BRV, SPD); increases BRV based on ATK
Commands.Galvanize: Party: 6 turns ATK Up I, BRV Regen; grants BRV based on own ATKHigh turn rate
Commands.Triple Break: 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attackGrants BRV to allies based on HP damage dealtTarget: 6 turns Enervate

Artifacts.Bravery HP Damage: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after taking HP damage.
Artifacts.The Strongest Squire Boost: Increases the effects of The Strongest Squire by 5%.
Artifacts.Bravery Shout: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Shout.
Artifacts.Bravery Galvanize: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Galvanize.

Passives.Shout BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using 「Shout」
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV
Passives.Break Supply: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after an ally breaks an enemy
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits
Passives.Galvanize Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using 「Galvanize」
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage upon attacking an enemy that is not targeting the user
Passives.The Strongest Squire: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts
Passives.Initiative: Slightly raises SPD for 3 turns at start of each wave
Passives.Shout Extension: Shout use +1When using Shout:• Slight boost• Higher turn rateHP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (grants BRV based on ATK + HP attack) while Shout active
Passives.Buffed Initial Up: Moderately raises INT BRV with active buffs
Passives.Galvanize Extension: Galvanize use +2When using Galvanize:• Slight ATK Up boost• Slight BRV Regen boost• Grants party MAX BRV Up II in addition to ATK Up, BRV Regen• Higher turn rateUpon using Galvanize:• BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack + grants BRV to party based on ATK) for 9 turns
